name: Lights of Dreams: The Angelical Blade
name_original: Lights of Dreams: The Angelical Blade
description:
Lights of Dreams: The Angelical Blade is a RPG game developed by Xilvan Design. It came out on 27-09-2007. It was published by Xilvan Design. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Lights of Dreams: The Angelical Blade on PC.
